Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are currently traveling along Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Directly to the south, you see Leomund's Water Purification shop. Of course, all Leomund does is take the water from the river and boil it to get rid of all the bacteria. He does pretty good business because either people are too lazy to do it themselves or too stupid. There is a small building to the west with a sign that reads "Silk Dreams" and a rather large bouncer guarding the door.
